text: James Scott Bruske (born October 7, 1964) is a former Major League Baseball right-handed pitcher for the Los Angeles Dodgers, San Diego Padres, New York Yankees and Milwaukee Brewers from 1995-2000. He is currently a Real Estate Agent in Scottsdale, Arizona.Realtor.com ==Sources== ==External links== , or Pelota Binaria Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:Albuquerque Dukes players Category:Baseball players from Illinois Category:Batavia Trojans players Category:Canton-Akron Indians players Category:Colorado Springs Sky Sox players Category:Columbus Clippers players Category:Indianapolis Indians players Category:Jackson Generals (Texas League) players Category:Kinston Indians players Category:Las Vegas 51s players Category:Las Vegas Stars (baseball) players Category:Los Angeles Dodgers players Category:Loyola Marymount Lions baseball players Category:Major League Baseball pitchers Category:Milwaukee Brewers players Category:Navegantes del Magallanes players Category:New York Yankees players Category:People from East St. Louis, Illinois Category:Sportspeople from Scottsdale, Arizona Category:Salt Lake Stingers players Category:San Diego Padres players Category:Tigres de Aragua players Category:Tucson Toros players Category:Williamsport Bills players Category:Antelope Valley Marauders baseball players
